name: Zesiger Capital
overview:
Zesiger Capital Group LLC is a New York City based SEC registered money management firm committed to maximizing total returns on assets under management.

Their global equity approach focuses on returns over the long term across domestic and international asset classes.

They are an independent, employee-owned firm, and their investment professionals have extensive and varied experience.

funding_round.source_description: Perlegen Raises $74 Million to Apply Pharmacogenomics to Late-Stage Drug Pipeline.
